Package org.dev.spanciuc.maven.mojo.githooks.commit_msg

Class BashScriptCommitMsgHookGenerator

java.lang.Object
org.dev.spanciuc.maven.mojo.githooks.commit_msg.BashScriptCommitMsgHookGenerator
All Implemented Interfaces:
GitHookFileGenerator
public class BashScriptCommitMsgHookGenerator extends Object implements GitHookFileGenerator
A class representing bash script commit-msg hook generator.

It's used to create a hook file in a given directory.
